import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";

import StatusCodes from "@theme/StatusCodes";
import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Update multiple inventory records by IDs"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/inventory/inventories/ids/update"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Updates multiple inventory stock records by their unique identifiers, allowing different update values for each record.

**Note**: This API is marked as deprecated (v1.0).

**Use Case**: Useful when you need to update multiple records with different values (e.g., different quantities at different locations).

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"description":"Array of inventory stock records with their InventoryId and update values.","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"object","description":"Request body for creating or updating an inventory stock record.","properties":{"InventoryId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Unique identifier of the inventory record (required for updates, generated on create)."},"InventoryItemId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Identifier of the catalog item."},"LocationId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Identifier of the location where stock is stored."},"SupplierId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","nullable":true,"description":"Identifier of the associated supplier."},"TrackInventory":{"type":"boolean","description":"Whether to actively track inventory for this stock entry."},"QuantityAvailable":{"type":"integer","description":"Number of units available."},"AverageCost":{"type":"number","format":"double","description":"Average cost per unit."},"MinQuantityAvailable":{"type":"integer","nullable":true,"description":"Minimum quantity threshold for reorder alerts."},"MaxQuantityAvailable":{"type":"integer","nullable":true,"description":"Maximum quantity threshold for overstock alerts."},"InventoryStateTypeId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Identifier describing the inventory state."}},"title":"UpdateInventoryRequest"}},"example":[{"InventoryId":"dd0380ff-6d1a-ed11-a1f9-000d3a7e102a","QuantityAvailable":200,"MinQuantityAvailable":20},{"InventoryId":"ee0380ff-6d1a-ed11-a1f9-000d3a7e102a","QuantityAvailable":75,"MinQuantityAvailable":10}]}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Inventory stock records updated successfully.","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","description":"Response envelope for updating multiple inventory stock records.","allOf":[{"type":"object","description":"Response envelope returned after successfully updating multiple resources in bulk. Based on C# `ListUpdateResponse<T>` from `Spark.Shared.Models.Responses`.","properties":{"Ids":{"type":"array","description":"Array of UUIDs for the updated resources","items":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"}},"Items":{"type":"array","description":"Array of updated entities (when returned)","nullable":true,"items":{"type":"object","additionalProperties":true}},"UserToken":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","nullable":true,"description":"Authenticated session identifier"},"RequestDate":{"type":"string","format":"date-time","description":"Timestamp when the API processed the request"},"ExecutionTime":{"type":"number","format":"double","description":"Server-side execution time in milliseconds"},"StatusCode":{"type":"integer","description":"HTTP status code (typically 200 for successful update)","example":200},"Message":{"type":"string","nullable":true,"description":"Optional informational message"},"ServerName":{"type":"string","description":"Application node that processed the request"},"ProcessId":{"type":"integer","description":"Internal process identifier for diagnostics"},"OperationId":{"type":"string","nullable":true,"description":"Trace identifier for log correlation"}},"required":["StatusCode"],"title":"ListUpdateResponse"}],"properties":{"Ids":{"type":"array","description":"Array of InventoryIds that were updated.","items":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"}}},"title":"InventoryBatchUpdateResponse"}}}}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
